title: Ticket #6970: Scheduler universe jobs can't update job counts when kerberos in use
description: In #6917, DAGMan would crash when Kerberos authentication was in use. The current theory is that it is initializing as a service and cannot read the keytab file. In reality, it should be initializing as a client.
remarks:
2020-Apr-10 07:42:27 by tim:
Bulk change of target version from v080808 to v080809 using ticket-target-mover.
creator: tim
